title: Elizabeth
description: Elizabeth, the heroine of the story, discovers that she is a guardian of a magical pigment. The pigment itself enhances her natural vampire abilities and allows her to absorb and utilize the energies found in gemstones. After she is reunited with her long-lost fianc, she discovers that he and herself are being hunted by a powerful family of vampires who are themselves seeking to fulfill an ancient prophesy. Elizabeth must confront the family of vampires in order to protect her lover and herself. The inner journey experienced by Elizabeth highlights her strength of character. She discovers who she really is and comes to terms with the fact that she has a destiny that is beyond her control.
author: Daisy-Jane Maxwell
